"Vienne": "Moving right along, the first place I'd like you to visit is in the south side of Danan Snowfields."
"There's a rather large, nameless lake there. I'll send you the detailed coordinates."
"I really like the view from that spot. When you arrive, can you take some image data and send it to me?"
"In my younger years, I had more freedom to go to all sorts of places. I traveled all around Aelio and Retem."
"I'm not alone in this hobby of mine, either. There's Bergmann, Wallace, and a few other folks who just love sightseeing."
"With how well-traveled you are, I actually wouldn't be surprised if you've met them before."
"It's been a long time since I've seen either of them. I hope they're doing well..."
"...Sorry, I ended up rambling a bit. Anyways, thanks in advance. Take your time with my request. There's no rush."
